Your Table.Body:
The story begins on a typical Saturday morning. You find yourself enjoying a nice breakfast at a restaurant.
You hear chatter from other tables, and as you finish your meal, you take a look at your phone to see several notifications!
Each of them from different numbers. They tell you to come back home immediately!

Before you go, you have to pay for your meal. Unfortunately, you realize your wallet is missing!
All you have is a single dollar. You need to look for cash quick.

Restaurant.Body: You are back at your table. What do you want to do?

Bathroom.Body: You make your way to the bathroom. You don't actually need to do anything here.

Other Tables.Body: You walk around the restaurant while looking at the other tables, hoping there is loose cash around.

Cashier.Body: You go up to the cashier. They tell you that your meal is $10.67.

On The Road.Body:
You pay for your meal using the money you scavenged and can quickly get back to your home! You didn't drive today, so you run back.
When arriving at the front door, you check for your keys but can't find them...
You forgot your keys. Time to look for your keys around the house.

Choices.Text: Check the back of the house

Front Door.Body: You're back at the front door. What will you do?

Choices.Text: Check the back of the house

Bushes.Body: You see that there's a key inside the bushes, but you can't reach it. You need something that can help you reach further.

Back House.Body: You go towards the back of the house. There doesn't seem like much of anything here.

Beyond.Body: Grass, don't forget to check for ticks!
